### v1.2.40
#### NEW FEATURES
- meter updated for october patch
- added option to show crit dmg column
- added shortcut option to manually save encounter
- added qol updates to save/load/reset meter position
#### BUG FIXES
- fixed pin party setting not working
full patch notes on github
send bug reports/suggestions to discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5
